title.value: Урожайность и экономическая эффективность озимой пшеницы в зависимости от уровня интенсификации технологии возделывания
Yield and economic effectiveness of winter wheat in dependence on intensification level of cultivation technology

journal.title: Arable Farming and Breeding in Belarus : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Satsyuk, I.V., National Academy of Sciences (Belarus). Scientific and Practical Center for  Arable Farming

abstract.value: In course of the research there was studied the effect of intensification levels on yield of winter wheat (Triticum aestivum) var. Legenda. The research was realized in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus on sod-podzolic sandy loam soil in 2008-2011 on the experimental fields of the Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming. As a result of realized research it was revealed that the studied technology methods by decreasing of the given yield increase were ranked as follows: ear protection by using products Abakus at stage 59-60 and Karamba at stage 73-75 (+3.7c/ha); nitrogen application N20 at stage 51-55 (+ 3.4 c/ha); upper leaves and ear protection by using Karamba at stage 51-52 (+ 3.0 c/ha), root rot protection by using Derosal at stage 30-31 (+ 1.7 c/ha); nitrogen application N15 at stage 71-73 (+ 1.4 c/ha). Cultivation of winter wheat var. Legenda under the third level of intensification technology was the most economically reasonable method (net income of 4.3 million Belarusian rubles per hectare, cost of 1106.7 thousand Belarusian rubles per ton, profitability of 80.7%).
